tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeMetrics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric1 INT,
    metric2 INT
);
CREATE TABLE Employee(id INT, name TEXT, department TEXT)
CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview(review_id INT, employee_id INT, review_date DATE, overall_rating INT, comments TEXT)
CREATE TABLE GoalSetting(goal_id INT, employee_id INT, goal TEXT, deadline DATE)
CREATE TABLE Department(department_id INT, department_name TEXT, manager_id INT)

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name TEXT,
  department TEXT,
  job_title TEXT,
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  reviewer TEXT,
  rating INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE goals (
  goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  goal_description TEXT,
  goal_due_date DATE,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name TEXT,
  department_head TEXT
)
